TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Armenia, title = Armenia, year = 2024, month = November, day = 18, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Armenia} }

S.FORM: Armenia Gaga kska Yacow ka Armenia, 40 00 N, 45 00 E ka gaga na nniqan. Kana ka knlbangan na o 29,743 sq km(hangan na o Tg143) (knlbanga dxgal o 28,203 sq km, knlbangan qsiya o 1,540 sq km). Kana ka sejiqun o niqan 3,051,250 hiyi. Gaga Yerevan ka pusu alang paru, jiyax 21 idas 9 ka jiyax skrayan klwaan. Manu ka dxgal Armenia ga wada sugan 59.70 ka dxgal qpahan, 9.10 ka dxgal bbuyu, rahuq dxgal do niqan 31.20 na. Bukung klwaan ta sayang o kiya ka Serzh Azati Sargsyan, pnaah hngkawas2008 idas 4 jiyax 9pnrajing kmlawa klwaan.
